wikipedia_page.main: Richard Yates (6 June 1921 – 1976) was a Welsh footballer who spent six years immediately after World War II playing centre-forward in the Football League for Chester, Wrexham, Carlisle United, and  New Brighton.

response: *Most league goals in a season – 36 Dick Yates (1946–47)
